title: Mechanisation
creator_credit: Michael Latham, Antony Jay, Peter Robinson and Video Arts
brief_description: Uses animation and documentary footage to show that as well as specialisation, another way of creating more wealth with the same number of people is through mechanisation. Shows that mechanisation has two forms: (i) finding more energy and (ii) using the energy you already have more efficiently and productively.
